tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE climate_data (
    satellite_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    pressure DECIMAL,
    data_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ClimateData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    satellite_id INT,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Climate_Data ( 
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  latitude DECIMAL, 
  longitude DECIMAL, 
  temperature DECIMAL, 
  humidity DECIMAL, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE Data_Analysis ( 
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  data_id INT, 
  satellite_id INT, 
  analysis_result VARCHAR(100), 
  analysis_timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
  FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES Climate_Data(data_id), 
  FOREIGN KEY (satellite_id) REFERENCES Satellite_Information(satellite_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE climate_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id INT,
    data_id INT,
    record_time TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_satellite FOREIGN KEY (satellite_id) REFERENCES satellites(id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_data FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES climate_data(id)
);

CREATE TABLE climate_data ( 
  date DATE, 
  temperature FLOAT, 
  humidity FLOAT, 
  pressure FLOAT, 
  PRIMARY KEY (date) 
)

CREATE TABLE satellite_images ( 
  image_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
  image_url TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE climate_patterns ( 
  pattern_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
  pattern_name TEXT, 
  pattern_description TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE climate_trends ( 
  trend_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
  trend_name TEXT, 
  start_date DATE, 
  end_date DATE 
)

CREATE TABLE satellite_metadata ( 
  satellite_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
  satellite_name TEXT, 
  launch_date DATE, 
  orbit_type TEXT 
)
